alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:45PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Baker County through 130 PM PDT... At 1244 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salisbury, or near Baker City, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Salisbury around 1250 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
